data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: What is a life lesson that you had to learn by making a mistake, and how did it make you a better person?
data.answer: This topic reminds me of a mistake I made during my university. In my freshman year, I was attracted by the new life in university so that I participated in several extra-curriculum activities. However, I spent only a few time on studying my major courses. Even for the final period, I didn't take the exams seriously, unsurprisingly, I failed one exam. Since it was a fundamental exam, I must pass it to enrol advanced courses. Therefore, my graduation was delayed for one more semester and there is a fail remark in my transcript. This mistake always warns me to treat study and life seriously at any time. In the following studies, I tried my best to balance between study and interests. Moreover, I gradually develop good habits on how to manage time wisely and utilize time efficiently. Although that mistake cannot be corrected, the lesson I learnt from it will benefit me for the rest of my life. (158字)
